sessionStarted.title: Session Started
sessionStarted.body: You session on the charging station '{{chargeBoxID}}', connector '{{connectorId}}' has been started successfully

ocpiPatchChargingStationsStatusesError.title: Patch Status
ocpiPatchChargingStationsStatusesError.body: The transfer to the roaming platform of the charging station's statuses has failed on location '{{location}}', check the logs

smtpAuthError.title: Email Server Error
smtpAuthError.body: The authentication against the primary email server has failed, check the configuration

optimalChargeReached.title: Optimal Charge Reached
optimalChargeReached.body: Your electric vehicle, which is connected to '{{chargeBoxID}}', connector '{{connectorId}}', reached its optimal charge (85%)

endOfCharge.title: Charge Finished
endOfCharge.body: Your electric vehicle, which is connected to the charging station '{{chargeBoxID}}', connector '{{connectorId}}', has just finished charging

endOfSession.title: Session Finished
endOfSession.body: Your session on the charging station '{{chargeBoxID}}', connector '{{connectorId}}' has just finished

unknownUserBadged.title: Unknown User
unknownUserBadged.body: An unknown user has just badged on '{{chargeBoxID}}' with the badge ID '{{badgeID}}'

chargingStationRegistered.title: Charging Station Connected
chargingStationRegistered.body: The charging station '{{chargeBoxID}}' just got connected to the central server

userAccountStatusChanged.title: Account {{status}}
userAccountStatusChanged.body: Your account has been {{status}} by an administrator

userAccountInactivity.title: User Account
userAccountInactivity.body: Your account has been inactive since {{lastLogin}}. For compliance reasons, please be aware that 6 months old inactive accounts will be deleted.

preparingSessionNotStarted.title: Session Not Started
preparingSessionNotStarted.body: Session not started on charging station '{{chargeBoxID}}', connector '{{connectorId}}'.

offlineChargingStation.title: Offline Charging Stations
offlineChargingStation.body: The following charging stations are offline in your organization: '{{chargeBoxIDs}}'

billingUserSynchronizationFailed.title: User Synchro Failed
billingUserSynchronizationFailed.body: Unable to synchronize {{nbrUsersInError}} user(s) with Billing Service provider

billing.chargingStopChargeBox: Charging {{totalConsumption}} kWh at charging station {{chargeBox}} (finished at {{time}})
